sourcesContent:
import './style/base.scss'; import './style/About.scss' import profileImg from './img/Profile.png' import { forwardRef } from 'react' function About (props, ref) { let description = 'Hello, my name is Vu. I\'m currently a high school student at VNU-HCM High school for the gifted. I love creating beautiful apps and websites.' let profile = { img: profileImg, description, age: 17, name: 'Vu Huy Bui' } return (

Full Name: {profile.name}

Age: {profile.age}



Description: {profile.description}

) } export default forwardRef(About)
